tasks: Performed frontend development for an interactive web application to improve functionality and user experience using HTML, CSS, jQuery ,Javascript.
Collaborated with senior developers to test and optimize existing code architectures for long standing simulation projects.
Started working as Reactjs Developer in the Frontend team.
Handle the restful api using reactjs and redux.
Started working as Reactjs Developer in the Frontend team
Worked with Front-end team to CarToBike, website using React JS, JavaScript, Redux, Material UI, HTML5, TypeScript & CSS.
Designed dynamic and browser compatible pages using HTML5, CSS3, React, and Javascript.
Start Designing front-end within object-oriented JavaScript frameworks like React JS
Integrated REST API’s with React Components
Hands-on experience in using Git/GitHub for version control and Jira, Trello as work management and issue tracking tools.
Worked with cross browser compatibility issues and did testing on the browsers like Google Chrome, Mozilla Firebox, Microsoft Edge

projects.description: This article shows you how to get the position of an element in React regardless of whether the element is fixed or repositionable. We’ll explore the technique to get the job done and then walk through a complete example of applying that in practice. The code will be written in Javascript and TypeScript for your reference according to your preferences. We’ll use modern features of React like hooks and functional components. Old-fashioned stuff like class-based components or things related to them won’t appear.
